snippet: Hend Nafea and several others were dragged, beaten and stripped by Egyptian security forces at another demonstration against military rule in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Hend Nafea and several others were dragged, beaten and stripped by Egyptian security forces at another demonstration against military rule in 2011.

headline.main: ‘Stripped, Beaten, Humiliated’ and Barred From Her Own Trial in Egypt
